name: Organic Apples
description: Fresh and crisp organic apples sourced from local farms. Perfect for a healthy snack or to add a juicy crunch to your favorite recipes.

name: Bananas
description: Naturally ripened bananas, perfect for a healthy snack. High in potassium and ideal for smoothies, baking, or simply enjoying on their own.

name: Oranges
description: Juicy and sweet oranges packed with Vitamin C. Enjoy them fresh, add to salads, or make a refreshing orange juice.

name: Strawberries
description: Bright red and delicious strawberries, freshly picked. These berries are perfect for desserts, smoothies, or as a refreshing snack.

name: Watermelon
description: Refreshing and hydrating watermelon for hot days. Sweet and juicy, great for salads, beverages, or as a cooling summer treat.

name: Pineapple
description: Sweet and tangy pineapples, perfect for tropical cravings. Great for desserts, cooking, or enjoying fresh. Full of tropical flavor and Vitamin C.

name: Blueberries
description: Antioxidant-rich blueberries that burst with flavor. Perfect for baking, smoothies, or topping your favorite breakfast foods.

name: Mangoes
description: Luscious and juicy mangoes, ideal for smoothies and desserts. Their unique flavor and aroma make them a tropical favorite for all ages.

name: Grapes
description: Seedless grapes that are both sweet and easy to enjoy. Snack on them fresh or add them to salads for a burst of natural sweetness.
